data.text:
We couldn't obscure the beautiful face of Mabel with text so we'll just casually add the link to our new blog here https://bit.ly/3QWTBoJ ğŸ‘€ Mabel is one of our canine colleagues and she sends a bark of approval for our blog about growing your network on LinkedIn without paying for premium! #NorthamptonSmallBusiness #NorthantsCreatives #WeGetYouNoticed #SupportLocal #NorthantsLife #SmallBusinessMarketing #NorthantsBusiness

Here we go again! Here's another round of 21 Questions with the Hummingbirds. ğŸ¤ This time, we put Emily from the Social Media team on the hot seat. What would you like to know about your pets? Do you have any questions or concerns about: ğŸŒŸ your pet's behaviors? ğŸŒŸ their basic health (nothing that a veterinarian would need to address)? ğŸŒŸ understanding their communication? ğŸŒŸ knowing when they feel stressed? ğŸŒŸ how to keep them safe? ğŸŒŸ animal welfare? ğŸŒŸ nutrition? ğŸŒŸ traveling with your pets? ğŸŒŸ legal concerns? ğŸŒŸ or something else? Let The Animal Files know by going to the link below. We will answer your questions. #theanimalfiles #TAFP #petwellcreative #wisdomapp #wisdomtalk #petcare #petsafety #askusanythingpets Ask me anything! Get a VOICE reply! https://lnkd.in/gwJKtQG5

https://lnkd.in/ddzKSt7p We must educate ourselves and our children on how to behave around animals. When to give them space and when to cuddle, that way we can avoid many harmful attacks. Also, when we are new to any of the animals, the trust factor plays an important role. Like every soul that has been through tough times, they develop trust issues, and it takes time for them to gain trust. Acting wisely and learning the techniques to gain trust and keep the trust will help build a bond. Until then, caring at a distance is a wise decision.

Granny paws, old-timers, sugar snootsâ€¦ whatever you call them, we at the Humane Society of Utah know that senior pets make some of the best fur-iends! ğŸ¶ğŸ¾ğŸ± For just a few of the many reasons why you should welcome a senior dog or cat into your family, check out our latest blog post at https://buff.ly/3QOsRIj! ğŸ’œ

Todaysâ€™ expression: when you lie with dogs you get fleas Meaning: if you associate with undesirable or questionable individuals, you may face negative consequences or adopt their negative traits Example: After joining that group of troublemakers, Jake quickly found himself in trouble with the law. It's true what they say, when you lie with dogs, you get fleas. #AmiableLanguageServices #learningenglish #learninglanguages #interestingexpressions #dogs #fleas
